wir sind die meister im biegen von holz: We are the masters of bending wood and produce some of the most challenging projects.
header about desc: We have a proven track record of taking on challenging projects with a focus on customer service and exceeding our clients' expectations.
about us desc: Lignum Suisse is a team of highly professional craftsmen that are super passionate about their job. We also work with the best designers in the industry and have the latest equipment available.
startase uber uns desc: We have a proven record of taking on challenging projects, focusing on customer service and exceeding client expectations.
wir verfugen uber professionelle maschin: We have professional machines that can bend wood to meet the design needs of your projects.
alles beginnt mit dem erhitzen des holze: Everything starts with heating the wood with hot steam.
wir biegen das erhitzte holz und machen: We bend the heated wood and make it strong.
wir verwenden weiseiche roteiche ulme hi: We use white oak, red oak, elm, hickory, ash etc.
unsere holzprodukte sind alterungsbestan: Our wood products are resistant to aging
geniesen sie einige der besten: Enjoy some of the finest craftsmanship you've ever seen.
stats_title: We are masters at bending wood and produce some of the artistic projects out of it.
die vordenker hinter der erstaunlichen h: The masterminds behind the amazing craftsmanship!
zu beginn des jahres 2016 startete ein n: At the beginning of 2016 a new chapter started.
besuchen sie uns in unserem hölzigen bet: Visit us in our wooden company, we look forward to seeing you!
why_us_desc: We have professional machines that can bend wood to meet the design needs of your projects.
fur uns ist die kundenzufriedenheit alle: For us, customer satisfaction is all we care about.
unsere qualitatsprodukte uberschreiten n: Our quality products are not beyond your budget.
alles was wir tun muss ein kunstwerk sei: Everything we do has to be a piece of art.
wir verpflichten uns und liefern punktli: We commit and deliver on time, always.
wir haben bewiesen dass das biegen von h: We have proven that bending wood can become a piece of art. It can be a bench, a chair, a courtyard, a raised bed or a professional toboggan sled.
teilen sie uns mit was sie wollen und wi: tell us what you want and we will work on it together
der davoser schlitten ist eines der beka: The davos sledge is one of the most well-known swiss symbols.
diese Holzbanke sind fur alle nutzungsar: These wooden benches are suitable for all types of use.
wir können alle in der vergangenheit ver: We can make any carpentry product used in the past.
haben sie noch andere holzprojekte im si: Do you have any other wood projects in mind? Feel free to contact us and we would be happy to work with you.
senden sie uns eine e mail oder rufen: Send us an email or give us a call and we’ll get in touch shortly. We would be delighted to speak.
